page.shortlink: api a5 batch passive link create function
page.description: The A5_BatchPassiveLinkCreate() function creates multiple passive-link tables. If Flag_Import is .T. then the function may import the tables as standard tables, not passive-link tables.
page.prototype: C a5_batchPassiveLinkCreate(C cs ,C tableList ,C folder ,C prefix ,L overwriteWithoutPrompting [,L flagImport [,L addTablesToDatabase ]])

argument.name: cs
argument.description: The connection string required to connect to the back-end database.

argument.name: tableList
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of tables on the back-end database.

argument.name: folder
argument.description: The directory into which to save the new tables.

argument.name: prefix
argument.description: A character string to prefix to each of the source table names when defining the destination table names.

argument.name: overwriteWithoutPrompting
argument.description:
Logical. Indicates whether the user needs to approve overwriting an existing table of the same name.
.T. = Do no prompt the user.
.F. = Ask the user for permission to overwrite an existing table

argument.name: flagImport
argument.description:
Logical. Optional. Default = .F.
.F. = Import tables as passive-link tables
.T. = Import tables as standard tables

argument.name: addTablesToDatabase
argument.description: Logical. Optional. Default = .T. Only meaningful if Flag_Import is .T. . .T. = Add tables
